attributes.action: Use anti-personnel mines to secure the UK border in Calais.
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of illegal immigrants are overwhelming Britain's border in France. They bring crime, disease, overcrowding and wage depreciation, are a burden on our welfare system and on our national infrastructure and routinely cause mass public outrage.

The only affective way to secure the border in Calais is by using anti-personnel mines.

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/europe/france/11946146/If-Brexit-happens-UK-wont-be-able-to-police-French-borders-to-stop-migrants-warns-France.html
attributes.background: The UK border in Calais is being routinely compromised by organised gangs of foreign often violent criminals. Fences and border agents without powers of arrest are inadequate therefore mines must be deployed and the relevant international treaties repealed to ensure their full and unassailable use.

rejection.details: Law and order in and around Calais is the responsibility of the French authorities.
